Target: The OntoSensorLoggerMobileApp ontology (OntoSensorLoggerMobileApp) is an ontology developed to represent the detailed information and spatial relationships

Comment: A quantity that has magnitude and direction.
Label: Vector

Comment: A vector quantity that represents the strength and direction of a magnetic field.
Label: MagneticFluxDensityVector

Comment: A vector quantity that represents the direction and magnitude of the force of gravity.
Label: GravityVector

Comment: A vector quantity that represents the rate of change of velocity.
Label: AccelerationVector

Comment: A relationship that describes a person possesses a smartphone.
Label: hasA

Comment: A relationship that defines the vector in the x-direction.
Label: hasXComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the vector in the y-direction.
Label: hasYComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the vector in the z-direction.
Label: hasZComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the linear acceleration with respect to the device's cooordinate system in the x-direction.
Label: hasXComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the linear acceleration with respect to the device's cooordinate system in the y-direction.
Label: hasYComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the linear acceleration with respect to the device's cooordinate system in the z-direction.
Label: hasZComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the acceleration vector due to gravity with respect to device's coordinate reference system in the x-direction (Short edge).
Label: hasXComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the acceleration vector due to gravity with respect to device's coordinate reference system in the y-direction (Long edge).
Label: hasYComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the acceleration vector due to gravity with respect to device's coordinate reference system in the z-direction (Through the phone).
Label: hasZComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the direction of magnetic north with respect to the device in the x direction.
Label: hasXComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the direction of magnetic north with respect to the device in the y direction.
Label: hasYComponent

Comment: A relationship that defines the direction of magnetic north with respect to the device in the z direction.
Label: hasZComponent
